member.summary: Defines the constants that specify where the drawer is placed.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.NavigationDrawer.Position.Left
member.summary: Places the drawer to the left position of the control.

member.summary: Places the drawer at the top position of the control.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.NavigationDrawer.Position.Right

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.NavigationDrawer.Position.Bottom
member.summary: Places the drawer at the bottom position of the control.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.NavigationDrawer.Transition
member.summary: Defines constants that specify how the drawer is animated when opened and closed.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.NavigationDrawer.Transition.Push
member.summary: Drawer gets opened pushing the main content.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.NavigationDrawer.Transition.Reveal
member.summary: Drawer will be placed beneath the main content and gets revealed moving the main content.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.NavigationDrawer.Transition.SlideOnTop
member.summary: Drawer will be above the main content and slides over the main content.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.NavigationDrawer.SfNavigationDrawer
member.summary: Represents a sliding menu that can be placed either left or right of the application page that allows to handle navigation between major modules of an application.
member.remarks: Contains two panes of which one is the sidebar pane that contains the navigation items. The other is the main content pane that displays the actual content of the application.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.NavigationDrawer.SfNavigationDrawer.IsOpen
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the drawer opening state of
member.value: true if drawer is in open state, otherwise false. The default value is false.
member.remarks: IsOpen property is applicable for all DisplayMode.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.NavigationDrawer.SfNavigationDrawer.Transition
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the transition of drawer based on .
member.value: One of the enumeration that specifies the transition of drawer. The default mode is .
member.remarks: Transition property only applicable when the DisplayMode is set as Default.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.NavigationDrawer.SfNavigationDrawer.AnimationDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the timespan for the expand and collapse animation of the drawer.
member.value: The duration of the drawer animation completion. The default value is 100.
member.remarks: AnimationDuration property only applicable when the DisplayMode is set as Default.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.NavigationDrawer.SfNavigationDrawer.TouchThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the threshold for easy panning from the edges.
member.value: The threshold for easy panning from the edges. The default value is 20.
member.remarks: TouchThreshold property only applicable when the DisplayMode is set as Default.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.NavigationDrawer.SfNavigationDrawer.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the position of drawer based on .
member.value: One of the enumeration that specifies the position of drawer. The default mode is .
member.remarks: Position property only applicable for when the DisplayMode is set as Default.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.NavigationDrawer.SfNavigationDrawer.EnableSwipeGesture
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the drawer opens on swiping or not.
member.value: true if swiping is enabled; otherwise, false.The default value is true.
member.remarks: EnableSwipeGesture property only applicable for when the DisplayMode is set as Default.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.NavigationDrawer.SfNavigationDrawer.ContentView
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that for the main view of the NavigationDrawer where the actual application content can be placed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.NavigationDrawer.SfNavigationDrawer.DrawerContentView
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that populates the body of the sidebar.
member.remarks: DrawerContentView property is applicable only when the DisplayMode is Default.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.NavigationDrawer.SfNavigationDrawer.DrawerHeaderView
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that populates the header of the sidebar.
member.remarks: DrawerHeaderView property is applicable only when the DisplayMode is Default.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.NavigationDrawer.SfNavigationDrawer.DrawerFooterView
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that populates the footer area of the sidebar.
member.remarks: DrawerFooterView property is applicable only when the DisplayMode is Default.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.NavigationDrawer.SfNavigationDrawer.DrawerHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates the height of the sidebar.
member.remarks: Applicable only if the Postion is either Top or Bottom along with DisplayMode as Default. Otherwise the control height will be the DrawerHeight.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.NavigationDrawer.SfNavigationDrawer.DrawerWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates the width of the sidebar.
member.remarks: Applicable only if the Postion is either Left or Right along with DisplayMode as Default. Otherwise the control width will be the DrawerWidth.
